terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback
Class ActionManager

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.FeedbackManager
      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.ActionManager
public class ActionManager
extends FeedbackManager

A manager that oversees action interaction for a group of targets. Management includes checking for multiple triggers on the same target and notification to collateral event targets of any action events.

Target interaction is monitored directly on the multishape target, which means that interaction can originate from any source, even a different manager. See FeedbackManager for details about adding a target for management.

Constructor Summary
ActionManager()
          Constructs an ActionManager with no event targets.

Constructor Detail

ActionManager

public ActionManager()
Constructs an ActionManager with no event targets. Use addTarget() to add event targets.

Method Detail

getOverTargetSource

public EnableSplitter getOverTargetSource()
Gets the collateral target "over target" event source, which is notified when the mouse-over state changes on any target trigger.

Note that trigger state changes are detected on the target itself and are not a result of any external feedback input to the target.

Returns:
Reference to the splitter.

getAllowPauseSource

public EnableSplitter getAllowPauseSource()
Gets the collateral target "allow pause" event source, which is notified when the allow-pause state changes on any trigger.

Note that trigger state changes are detected on the target itself and are not a result of any external feedback input to the target.

Returns:
Reference to the splitter.

manageFeedback

protected void manageFeedback(FeedbackMinion minion,
                              int state,
                              boolean isTarget)
Description copied from class: FeedbackManager
Override this method to perform feedback management including relaying trigger events to the target. Called when a feedback event occurs on any managed target or trigger.

Specified by:
manageFeedback in class FeedbackManager
Parameters:
minion - Minion whose state changed. Never null.
state - New feedback state of the same event type as the minion.
isTarget - True if the event originated from a target. False if it originated from a trigger (i.e. user input).
